docstr: `GETPID` — Process ID function ### Description Returns the numerical process identifier of the current process. ### Syntax `RESULT = GETPID()` ### Return value The return value of `GETPID` is an `INTEGER` of the default kind. ### Example ``` program info   print *, "The current process ID is ", getpid()   print *, "Your numerical user ID is ", getuid()   print *, "Your numerical group ID is ", getgid() end program info ``` ### Standard GNU extension ### Class Function ### See also GETGID, GETUID
